issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
The server hangs during XA operations. When it is restarted after being killed, it fails to start. Following error is logged:

Server is ready to accept connections on port 1527.
Connection number: 1.
----------------------------------------------------------------
2005-05-30 20:18:33.550 GMT:
 Booting Derby version The Apache Software Foundation - Apache Derby - 10.1.0.0 alpha - (178031M): instance c013800d-0104-2f41-2f4c-ffff83f23fc8
on database directory D:\DERBY\databases\tca

Registered SQLDecimal for identifier 200, indicates more development work needed for J2ME DECIMAL support.

.java
